reviewText: This DVD may be easy to follow instruction, but seems complicated for a novice. I  will file away for now.

Its not exactly for a "stealth grow" but it is for growing and that's what I wanted it for. But, I did not take into account the amount of space I wanted to take up. This DVD will show you how to take up a small corner of a basement kind of deal, I was hoping for a closet sized, or smaller. But still, it is a great buy if you want to grow.
